description: Main entry point for the KindlePlus Flutter mobile application, setting up environment variables, theme, routing, and initial screens with support for TV mode.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, configuring theme, routing, and initial screen based on TV mode detection.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous main function initializing Flutter bindings, loading environment variables, and starting the app.

methods.name: _loadEnv
methods.description: Loads environment variables from a .env file if present, with error handling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp widget, configuring routes and home based on TV mode.
